external_games.name: Everyone's A Wally: A Day in the Life of Wally
Everyone's A Wally: A Day in the Life of Wally

name: Everyone's A Wally: A Day in the Life of Wally
summary: Everyone's a Wally is a game by Mikro-Gen where the main objective is to get into the bank and withdraw money via solving a series of linked puzzles and collect the letters B-R-E-A-K
